metadata.title: CVE-2023-52355 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An out-of-memory flaw was found in libtiff that could be triggered bypassing a crafted tiff file to the TIFFRasterScanlineSize64() API. Thisflaw allows a remote attacker to cause a denial of service via a craftedinput with a size smaller than 379 KB.

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
gdal: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
